display_long_description:
Host your next game night with VRUNO, a social VR card game! Grab a group of friends or meet new people in the game. You can also choose to go solo and play against AI robots with some big personalities. 

VRUNO brings a space ship directly into your living room! Enjoy all the familiar game mechanics - match your card by color or number, throw in a wild, or cause mayhem with the infamous reverse card. 

And there’s a new VR-only twist to the game! Down to one card? Hit the VRUNO button and dance it out as quickly as you can before someone else does. Not in a dancing mood? No worries, head to the settings and toggle it off.

VRUNO is customizable for how YOU choose to play. Want to stack +2 and +4 cards? Let’s do it! Just want a quick game? Try the “Quick 2” game mode. Want to force players to draw cards until they f-i-n-a-l-l-y get a card that they can play? You’re a brutal game night host, and we’ve got you covered. 

Have questions, suggestions or want to connect with the VRUNO community? Come join our discord! https://discord.gg/WRrpM4GMDG

Features:
• Supports 1 - 8 players
• Private and public rooms
• AI Robots
• Customizable rules (Infinite Draw, Stacking, Brutal, Classic, Quick 2)
• In game radio, play music from the top 40 to oldies
